title: My account got perma banned
body:
My account ign: Aray was perma banned when I tried to log on today, sadly I don't remember the email associated with the account and hence can't find out the reason why. So I'm left to speculate, I'll admit I afk'd several times in ranked on it and acted poorly in chat numerous times but I'm unsure why my account would have been punished to this degree. Anybody able to help? A red post would be greatly appreciated. 

Also I'm posting on forums under the ign which confuses me but it's letting me do so, and yes I am going to send in a support ticket.

Hey Aray,

From what I can see, your account has been flagged as being involved with BOTTING therefore the permaban.

If you believe that was not the case, please contact player support and they will help you.

Thanks very much Mastermirkinen, the account was botted on NA server and then given to me about a year ago so that would explain it. I'm still going to submit a ticket and ask for it restored, might as well try.

Can you tell me if there's anything that I can do on my end? The account mattered a lot to me seeing as I spent 50$ RP on champs and ranked it into platinum 3.

haha, what? 

admitting your account is not even yours AND that it was botted on

yea.. im SUREEEE you will get it back. lol
I never said the account wasn't mine, it's under my email. The account was botted, only human to play on it was me.

Hey there Summoner, 

Your circumstances are very unfortunate but by the sounds of it you have been very negligent with use of your account and therefore Riot had all right to give the account a permanent suspension. In addition, under no circumstances will Riot take any action in revoking the suspension of your account. Regardless of whatever expenses you have made on the account. 

That said you should be grateful it is only a permanent suspension of one account and not an IP address suspension, because they are a lot more painful (but still manageable). I suggest that when creating your new account you reevaluate your game play and player frame of mind to avoid any further suspensions.

Kind Regards,
